title: Hospitality CLIL Design Thinking-Based Integrated Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Basic hospitality industry terminology and work experience
context.additional_context: Language-content integrated learning through practical case analysis in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners apply problem-solving strategies three or more times in hospitality-scenario-based English presentations
Teams develop one customer service protocol improvement plan using the design thinking process
Learners analyze five or more professionally produced CLIL-based materials to create business manual improvement proposals

resources: CLIL (Content and Language Integrated Learning) Material Template

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
